s: Summary: Chinese‑language salon on RWA and tokenized economy exploring enterprise Web3 transformation pathways.
Topics: Real‑world asset tokenization, enterprise adoption, Web3 strategy, token economics.
Speakers: 奇点科技 and 高盈量化 representatives.
r: Understand practical roadmaps for enterprise tokenization.
Network with leading Chinese Web3 innovators and investors.
Explore business models leveraging RWA token economies.
